channel.title: C o r u s c a t e
channel.description: Recent content on C o r u s c a t e

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Portuguese software developer who started experimenting with noise music a decade ago, currently building a minimalist approach to slow music - layers of piano, tape loops, found noises, and granular synthesis. Music for sleeping, most of the time. Thank you Made with Hugo Themed by Cupper Deployed to Netlify Terminal logo by SVG PORN
